content: nutmeg size unisex xxxs xxs xs s m l xl xxl xxxl see table size chest bicep cuff under- collar- collar arm-to to-under cuff -arm xxxs 32 10 8 19 8 16 5 xxs 34 11 8 19 5 8 17 xs 36 12 8 5 20 8 5 17 5 s 38 13 9 20 9 18 m 40 14 9 20 9 5 18 l 42 15 9 20 10 18 xl 44 16 9 5 20 11 18 xxl 46 17 10 21 12 18 5 xxxl 48 18 10 5 21 13 19 collar-to-underarm refers to the distance from your cast on row to the point in the pattern where you will separate the sweater into three sections for the arms and chest it is effectively the distance from your collar to where the underarms of the sweater will fall and should be measured straight down from the collar not along the increase lines yoke underarm-to-cuff is the length of the sleeve from the underarm to the cuff co 58 60 62 64 64 64 64 66 68 st pm and join all measurements are in inches on first round k 25 26 27 27 28 28 28 29 30 chest bicep cuff and collar are all circumfer- pm k 4 4 4 5 4 4 4 4 4 pm k ence measurements 25 26 27 27 28 28 28 29 30 pm k 4 4 4 5 4 4 4 4 4 k 4 more rounds then p all materials stitches 1 round 6 6 7 7 8 8 9 9 10 skeins of tilli tomas symphony next round begin the following pattern bulky in parchment 115 yds/100 g 20% kid r1-2 k around mohair 70% silk 7% nylon 3% wool us #9 5 5 mm needles circular needles 36 inch or r3 k around but m1 one stitch before and longer or us#9 5 5 mm dpns one stitch after every marker 8 increases 4 stitch markers total 2 stitch holders or scrap yarn r4 k around tapestry needle for bulky yarn r5 same as r3 gauge repeat this 5-row pattern 14 st /20 row = 4 in 10 cm stockinette stitch on 7 8 8 9 10 11 11 12 13 times us #9 needles key continued on pg 2 bobble - bind off co - cast on k - knit k2tog - knit 2 together k2togtbl - k2tog through back loops m1 - make 1 stitch p - purl pm - place marker 1 ©jenifer stark - www jeniferstark com - jen@jeniferstark com nutmeg for sizes xxxs and s only k 2 rounds on next round k1 m1 k until 1 before marker m1 k1 slip marker k across to next marker slip marker k1 m1 k until 1 before next marker m1 k1 slip marker k to end of round k1 round even then work next round again as follows k1 m1 k until 1 before marker m1 k1 slip marker
